授業方法: The course will use a mixture of lectures, pair-work, group work, and presentations in teaching practical English skills.

第1回: Week 1 - Introductions: Course Explanation, Classroom Language, Technology Set-ups,
第2回: Week 2 - Topic 7: Vocabulary Practice, Grammar Focus; Listening and Reading Practice
第3回: Week 3 - Topic 7: Conversation and Discussion Activities; Presentation Preparation; Presentations
第4回: Week 4 - Topic 8: Vocabulary Practice, Grammar Focus; Listening and Reading Practice
第5回: Week 5 - Topic 8: Conversation and Discussion Activities; Presentation Preparation; Presentations
第6回: Week 6 - Topic 9: Vocabulary Practice, Grammar Focus; Listening and Reading Practice
第7回: Week 7 - Topic 9: Conversation and Discussion Activities; Presentation Preparation; Presentations
第8回: Week 8 - Topic 10: Vocabulary Practice, Grammar Focus; Listening and Reading Practice
第9回: Week 9 - Topic 10: Conversation and Discussion Activities; Presentation Preparation; Presentations
第10回: Week 10 - Topic 11: Vocabulary Practice, Grammar Focus; Listening and Reading Practice
第11回: Week 11 - Topic 11: Conversation and Discussion Activities; Presentation Preparation; Presentations
第12回: Week 12 - Topic 12 : Vocabulary Practice, Grammar Focus; Listening and Reading Practice
第13回: Week 13 - Topic 12: Conversation and Discussion Activities; Presentation Preparation; Presentations
第14回: Week 14 - Final Week:  Final Projects; Reflection and Discussion;

評価.教科書Required texts0: NOTE: Textbook is the same as previous semester. Do not buy new textbook.
評価.学位授与の方針との関連Relationship to Diploma Polic:
各授業科目は、各学部・研究科の定めるディプロマ・ポリシー（DP）・カリキュラム・ポリシー（CP）に基づき、カリキュラム上に配置されています。
DP・CPを意識して本授業科目の学修を進めることで、各学部・研究科の期待する能力が養成されます。
各学部・研究科のDP、CPや教育課程表（授業科目一覧等）は、下記リンクこちらに掲載していますので学修計画の参考にしてください。
https://kwic.kwansei.ac.jp/cabinet/reference?typeCd=0&cabinetId=557&directLink=1
